text: If the element altformavail is not empty, you COULD try to identify if the originals are present in the EHRI portal and make a link between the two descriptions
archdesc MUST have a level-attribute
The value of the archdesc level attribute SHOULD be 'fonds', 'recordGrp', 'collection' ot 'otherlevel'.
archdesc SHOULD have a non-empty origination
archdesc-processinfo SHOULD not be empty
archdesc-processinfo SHOULD have a non empty date
archdesc COULD have a langmaterial
archdesc COULD have a custodhist
archdesc COULD have an otherfindaid
archdesc COULD have an originalsloc
archdesc COULD have an altformavail
archdesc COULD have a bibliography
archdesc COULD have an odd
archdesc COULD have a note
archdesc COULD have a scopecontent
archdesc COULD have a controlaccess
a scopecontent element should be present at least in archdesc if not in the c elements
c01 MUST have a level-attribute
c02 MUST have a level-attribute
c03 MUST have a level-attribute
c04 MUST have a level-attribute
c05 MUST have a level-attribute
c06 MUST have a level-attribute
c subelements SHOULD be between c01 and c06
c subelements SHOULD be between c01 and c06
c subelements SHOULD be between c01 and c06
c subelements SHOULD be between c01 and c06
c subelements SHOULD be between c01 and c06
c subelements SHOULD be between c01 and c06
'revisiondesc/change' element must contain both a date and an item subelement.
a revisiondesc/change SHOULD have a not empty date
controlaccess COULD have a subject
controlaccess COULD have a geogname
controlaccess COULD have a persname
controlaccess COULD have a orgname
Access points could be chosen in an authority list. This list should be declared in a @source attribute. The related id of this authority should be declared in an @authfilenumber attribute
@normal attribute must respect ISO8601 pattern = YYYY-MM-DD
a did MUST have a unitid, according 17.3 and WP19
a did MUST have a unittitle, according 17.3
a did MUST have at least one non-empty unittitle
dsc MUST have a type attribute
dsc MUST have a type attribute
If the language of the description is not English, a parallel form of the title in English should be added.
eadheader must contain a profiledesc element
If the language of the description is not English, a parallel form of the title in English should be added.
eadheader COULD have a non-empty creation-date
eadid must contain text
eadid SHOULD contain a mainagencycode attribute
langmaterial COULD have a language sub element
language MUST have a langcode attribute
language SHOULD have a scriptcode attribute
If the element originalsloc is not empty, you COULD try to identify if copies are present in the EHRI portal and make a link between the two descriptions
a did SHOULD have a non-empty physdesc-extent, according to 17.3
eadheader MUST contain a langusage/language element
eadheader should contain a creation element
descrules has a default value added automatically by EHRI.
eadheader SHOULD specify a publisher
unitdates COULD have a label, describing the type of date, according 17.3
unitdate should be not empty or have a non-empty @normal attribute
unitdate should have a non-empty @normal attribute
end date MUST exist
a unitid SHOULD not be empty
unitid's MUST be unique within one eadfile, according 17.3

If the repositoryencoding is set to iso15511, the format of the value of the repositorycode attribute ofis constrained to that of the International Standard Identifier for Libraries and Related Organizations (ISIL: ISO 15511): a prefix, a dash, and an identifier.
If the attribute level has the value 'otherlevel', an attribute otherlevel MUST be added
ONLY the archdesc can be fonds level

test: not(@level = 'recordgrp') or (parent::*[@level = 'recordgrp'] or (name(.) = 'archdesc') or (name(.) = 'c01') and ancestor::*[@level = 'recordgrp'])
text: recordgrp SHOULD be a child of another recordgrp

test: not(@level = 'subgrp') or ((parent::*[@level = 'recordgrp' or @level = 'subgrp']) or (name(.) = 'c01') and ancestor::*[@level = 'recordgrp'])
text: subgrp SHOULD be a child of another subgrp or a recordgrp
subseries SHOULD be a child of another subseries or a series
The langcode attribute should contain a code from the ISO 639 codelist.
The script or scriptcode attribute should contain a code from the iso_15924 codelist.
The countrycode attribute should contain a code from the ISO 3166-1 codelist.
